DOC.brief_summary: Choriogonadotropin alfa ( Ovidrel® ) recombinant hCG ( rhCG ) preparation derive genetically engineer Chinese hamster ovary cell , widely use final oocyte maturation trigger assist reproductive technology ( ART ) .Recombinant hCG investigate safety efficacy compare urinary hCG , still optimal dose rhCG questionable . From former study , proven high dose hCG make ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome ( OHSS ) usual condition . On hand , hypothesize high dose hCG may improve oocyte maturity poor responder easily provoke OHSS . Hence , study assess comparative efficacy safety 250mcg 500mcg rhCG ART treatment cycle .
DOC.brief_title: Optimal rhCG ( Ovidrel® ) Dose Poor Responder During IVF ICSI Cycles
DOC.detailed_description: Randomized prospective clinical study compare two dos rhCG ( 250mcg vs. 500mcg ) .
DOC.criteria: poor response prior IVF cycle ( ≤ 4 oocyte retrieve ) woman 's age ≥ 40 year FSH ≥ 10mIU/mL AMH ≤ 1.1ng/mL Antral follicle count < 6 patient without informed consent
